creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: old sepia-toned image of group of Native American men seated in front of teepees, with standing man wearing eagle feather headdress pointing to one of the seated men; mountains in background; text around and at bottom of image, with "INDIAN LAND FOR SALE" printed at top
markings: on back at bottom, in pencil: 2/10
signed: on back at bottom, in pencil: From Every Mountainside  Tom Jones 2002
title: Dear America: From Every Mountain Side
